2.label: I'm Done
2.desc: In the fireplace on the ground floor. To enter the building, you need to climb up the @link[special.7] and around to the balcony on the back.

3.label: I Can't Work Like This!
3.desc.2: On a small table next to the torpedo.

4.label: The V2's Are Obsolete!
4.desc: On a chair in the control room.

5.label: Thinking Outside the Box
5.desc: On a desk up in the central tower.

2.label: Dr. Junger's Schedule
2.desc.1: On a desk in the tent.
2.desc.2: On a desk in the building.
2.desc.3: On a desk in the shelter.

3.label: A-4B Logistical Issues
3.desc: On a desk in the room with all of the blueprints.

5.label: Pressurisation Report
5.desc: On a desk on the topmost floor of the castle tower.

3.label: Pistol Workbench
3.desc: In an armory, reachable via a @link[special.3|secret entrance].

1.label: Peenemünde Lab ID
1.desc: Under one of the tables in the bunker's dining area.

2.label: Luftwaffe Playing Cards
2.desc: On a wooden table in the building.

3.label: Prüfstand XII Plans
3.desc: On the floor under the bridge.

1.label: Stone Eagle
1.desc: Nestled between some rocks. Can only be seen from the east.

2.label: Stone Eagle
2.desc: In one of the dam's spillways.

3.label: Stone Eagle
3.desc: Hidden on the side of the building.

1.label: Neutralize the Radio Tower
1.desc.3: Option B - Sabotage radio tower generator.

2.label: Abandoned House
2.desc: A defected Axis scientist is hiding out in an abandoned house.

3.label: Proving Grounds Breach
3.desc: Tank firing range is under repairs.

4.label: Resistance Cache
4.desc: Resistance scouts were spotted near the waterfall.

5.label: Castle Sewers
5.desc: Sewer tunnels connect to the castle interior.

6.label: Axis Armoury
6.desc: Resistance scouts mentioned an armoury on site.

7.label: Southern Checkpoint
7.desc: Resistance scouting indicates this checkpoint is heavily defended.

8.label: Eastern Checkpoint
8.desc: Resistance scouting indicates this checkpoint is less fortified.

9.label: Hill Breach
9.desc: A fence is under repairs near a sniper nest.

3.label: Weapons Lab Door
3.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.3] or a satchel charge.

4.label: Master Dome Door
4.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.4] or a satchel charge.

5.label: Master Dome Office Door
5.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.4] or a satchel charge.

6.label: Master Dome Armory Door
6.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.4] or a satchel charge.

7.label: Production Plant Door
7.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.8] or a satchel charge.

8.label: Control Room Door
8.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.8] or a satchel charge.

4.label: Fuse Box
4.desc: Takes out the power for the nearby @link[searchlight.1].

5.label: Fuse Box
5.desc: Takesout the power for the house next to it.

6.label: Fuse Box
6.desc: Takes out the power for the nearby @link[searchlight.2].

8.label: Fuse Box
8.desc: Takes out the power for the nearby searchlights (@link[searchlight.3|1] and @link[searchlight.4|2]).
